effect_entries.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 70% chance to raise the user's Special Attack by one stage.
effect_entries.short_effect: Has a 70% chance to raise the user's Special Attack by one stage.

flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
The user attacks with an electric
charge. The user may use any remaining
electricity to raise its Sp. Atk stat.
